docs.lead_paragraph: After stumbling through a question at a forum Thursday night about whether people choose to be gay or are born that way, Democratic presidential candidate Bill Richardson spent part of the day trying to regain his footing by reaching out to prominent members of the gay and lesbian community.
docs.abstract: Bill Richardson sought to patch up his relationship with the gay and lesbian community after his remarks at a gay issues forum on Thursday.

docs.lead_paragraph: Last night's forum for the Democratic candidates sponsored by the gay-rights group Human Rights Campaign wasn't a debate at all -- the candidates appeared one at a time and the panel of questioners, including the rocker Melissa Etheridge, did a fair amount of cheerleading.
